sentences.en: Delay always breeds danger; and to protract a great design is often to ruin it.
sentences.cn: 推迟经常孕育危险；拖延一个伟大的工程常常意味着毁灭它。

sentences.en: High structure strength, hot dip galvanized, greatly protract time of use.
sentences.cn: 高强度管材、产品经热镀锌处理、大大地延长了使用寿命；

sentences.en: Let's not protract the debate any further.
sentences.cn: 我们不要再继续争论下去了.

sentences.en: The cat can protract its paws.
The inspector informed us that he was to protract his stay for some days.
sentences.cn: 督察通知我们他将在此多呆几天.

sentences.en: Three hours have passed since the discussion was begun, and I'm afraid they will protract It'still longer.
sentences.cn: 这个讨论会已经开了3个小时了, 而且恐怕他们还会拖延下去的.

sentences.en: To lose the present in lamenting the past, was voluntarily to protract a melancholy vision.
sentences.cn: 为悲哀过去而失去眼前, 这是自愿地把忧郁的景象拖延下去.

sentences.en: To protract the suspense, he paused for a considerable period of time before telling us the result of the experiment.
sentences.cn: 为了延长悬念，他在告诉我们实验结果之前停顿了相当一段时间。

sentences.en: Using this method, we can protract vector analysis atlas of planetary gear drive mechanism.
sentences.cn: 应用此方法, 可定性地绘制出行星齿轮传动机构速度分析图谱.

words.tran_cn: 伸肌；分度器；伤处异物摘出器
拖延；绘制；伸展（protract的过去分词）

trans.tran_en: to lengthen or extend (a speech, etc); prolong in time
to lengthen or extend (a speech, etc); prolong in time
